titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the James E. Slocum scrapbook

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: In 2011, items from the scrapbook were removed and placed in acid-free folders. The Chicago Tribune article was removed and cataloged separately.

archdesc.bioghist: Student at the University of Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Includes concert and theatrical programs, material concerning Alpha Delta Phi fraternity, class schedules, calling cards, and miscellanea; also a long article from the Chicago Tribune, 1886, on student life and the history of the University of Michigan.
